<div style="text-align: center; padding-top: 2em; font-size: 2.2em; font-family: 'sans-serif', sans-serif;">

Sound Figures

</div>

<div style="text-align: justify; font-size: .9em;">
  Audio Engineer <a href="https://www.discogs.com/de/artist/864606-Hannes-Kumke">Hannes Kumke</a>, who recorded and mastered some tracks of our album <i>Accretion Disk</i>, visualized our track <i>Plexus</i> using water and light to reflect what our track looks like. The idea is based on Alexander Lauterwasser's Kymatik-Cymatics - Sound Figures.
  <br>
   <br>
  
</div>
